entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lytton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lytton 07:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Periods of freezing rain near Boston Bar this morning and early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
